title: 2000 Liga Indonesia Premier Division Final
text: The 2000 Liga Indonesia Premier Division Final was a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> match which was played on 23 July 2000 at <a href="Gelora%20Senayan%20Main%20Stadium">Gelora Senayan Main Stadium</a> in <a href="Jakarta">Jakarta</a>. It was contested by <a href="PSM%20Makassar">PSM Makassar</a> and <a href="Pupuk%20Kaltim">Pupuk Kaltim</a> to determine the winner of the <a href="1999%E2%80%932000%20Liga%20Indonesia%20Premier%20Division">1999–2000 Liga Indonesia Premier Division</a>. PSM Makassar won the match 3–2 to claim their first-ever professional title.
